name: First Class Room
description: The first class room is truly a first-class experience.  We pamper you with rose petals on the bed followed by turn-down service at night complete with a chocolate mint.

name: Deluxe Room
description: The deluxe room will have you feeling pampered while you gaze out on the amazing ocean-front vistas these rooms provide.

name: Suite Room
description: Travelling with a larger family? The suite room is for you.  Four beds and two bathrooms on in a townhouse style accommodation will ensure everyone has the room they need to fully enjoy our resort's ammenities.
